message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite comfortable with $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $95?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $105. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $102.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $98?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and meet you at $100.50. What do you think?
I'm close to my budget, but I'm still willing to make a small concession. Would you be willing to meet me at $99?
I'm not willing to go below $100, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
